summary: A washed-out German sailor, in a drunken state, agrees to take two British women from Gibraltar to the West Indies in his sail boat. Early into the voyage, they realise that it's not going ... See full summary »
cast: Jürgen Prochnow|Patsy Kensit|Elizabeth Hurley|Franz Buchrieser|Grazyna Szapolowska|Carmel S. Aquilina|Manuel Cauchi|John Suda|Elton Mamo|Mario Stock|John Ciantar|Kimba
title: Der Skipper
